fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Culture, International co-operation and development, Single market, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Communication
eu_initiatives:
A long-term strategy on the future use of the UHF band 
(470-790 MHz) in the European Union / RSPG14-555
organisation_name: Association of Professional Wireless Production Technologies (APWPT)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Mitarbeit in Arbeitsgruppen der CEPT, ETSI, ITU-R und Link16
goals__remit: This association promotes on an international level the efficient and demand-driven provision and use of production frequencies for professional event productions as well as safeguarding such production frequencies for the users on the long run.
